diff:
engine                  = "postgres"
     engine_version          = "14.5"
     family                  = "postgres14"
-    instance_class          = "db.t4g.small"
-    storage_type            = "gp2"
+    instance_class          = "db.m5.large"

     allocated_storage       = "20"
     max_allocated_storage   = 0
     multi_az                = true
